release_note: Hello Structured users! As we move through February we re pleased to announce the latest update to your planning tool. This release includes a special feature developed with expert input as well as several other enhancements aimed at improving your experience with Structured. What s New in Structured 3.4 1. Energy Monitor: In partnership with the Dutch institute Breinstraat and with contributions from scientists and medical professionals we re introducing the Energy Monitor. This new feature is designed to help individuals with brain injuries track and manage their energy levels throughout the day. Recognizing its potential utility for a wider audience we ve made the Energy Monitor available to all users as an experimental feature. It can be enabled in Advanced Settings allowing you to assign energy levels to tasks and monitor your daily energy usage. We welcome your feedback on this feature. To learn more about this feature check out our blog post at structured.app blog. 2. New Icons and Animations: We ve added a set of new icons and animations across the app to provide a refreshed look and add some playful touches here and there. 3. Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements: This update includes fixes for known issues and improvements to app stability. Compatibility Notice: Starting with Structured 3.4 the app requires iOS 16 watchOS 9 and macOS 13 to ensure access to the latest features and optimal performance. If upgrading is not an option for you the previous version of Structured remains available without further updates. We hope you find the new features and improvements useful. Your feedback is important to us as we continue to develop Structured to better meet your needs. Best The Structured Team

We hope the year has been kind to you so far! We re thrilled to share that at Structured we ve been sticking to our New Year s resolutions and are proud to roll out a new update for you. Here s what s new in Structured 3.3.2 1. Apple Vision Pro Support: We love innovation! With the release of the Apple Vision Pro on February 2 Structured is coming in a modified iPad version to your physical workplace. Integrate your daily schedule straight into your environment and create your perfect working space on your new Vision Pro. 2. Improved and Faster Icon Search: Our revamped icon search is here to read your mind almost . Find the perfect icons faster helping you express tasks visually and streamline your planning process. 3. Emoji Search: We love emojis. Our new emoji search feature allows you to search for icons by using emojis. It s as simple as that. 4. Bug Fixes and Improvements: Not revolutionary but still important. We ve worked hard to address bugs and make overall improvements to the user experience. We are looking forward to receiving feedback and ideas for upcoming updates. Write to you next time.

First of all happy holidays! Just in time for the festive season we re back with a new update packed with new features and improvements for you to ensure a smooth start into the new year. Here s what s new in Structured 3.3: 1. Enhance your planning experience with Shortcuts support Get even more tasks done create your own Shortcuts and automations combine Structured with other supported apps and bring your productivity to the next level. For beginners we also have preset app shortcuts you can access via Siri and Spotlight Search. 2. Clearer Text and Improved Translations We ve reworked the in app text and tuned the translations for a better experience for all users no matter what language. For the best experience we suggest using English German Spanish or French. 4. More Efficient Backup Management Set a limit for saved backups to prevent your iCloud from getting cluttered. Older backups are now automatically removed. 5. Home Screen Quick Actions Additional quick actions can be accessed by long pressing the app icon to access several actions even faster 6. Subscription Renewal Reminders Receive timely reminders for subscription renewals or expirations ensuring you re in the loop. 7. Bug Fixes and Performance Enhancements We are looking forward to receiving feedback and ideas for upcoming updates. Also keep your eyes out for a special surprise towards the end of the year! All the best The Structured Team

After the big launch of iOS 17 thanks for all the great feedback we ve been working hard to dig through issues that came up in the past few weeks. This update addresses most of these issues. It fixes many bugs and crashes. Additionally we ve worked on improving the speed of updating widgets. We hope these improvements make your work more productive and your breaks more enjoyable. If you continue to encounter any problems please let us know! The Structured Team

We are thrilled to announce another big Structured update! This time we introduce support for some new features around widgets which were just released with the new iOS. Besides that we spent a lot of time optimizing things behind the scenes and have fixed over 100 bugs! Especially the calendar and reminders integration are more reliable and smoother. Interactive Widgets With the latest iOS update widgets can finally be interactive and we are here on day one to support it. This means you can check off your tasks without having to open the app even from your lock screen. Simply tap the checkmark or circle to toggle a task and if there is no checkmark because the widget is too small try tapping the title of the task. StandBy Mode Another big addition to the recent iOS update is the new StandBy mode. Whenever you charge your phone is in landscape a new beautiful display of the current time will show up. You also have the option to add your own widgets and of course we recommend adding the Structured widget which was optimized specifically for this. StandBy is perfect for keeping an eye on your timeline while at your desk and interactive widgets work here too. Customizable Widgets Another significant change to widgets is the ability to customize some aspects of it. You can now choose to display all day tasks at the top of a Timeline widget control if the Plus button is shown or set the order of tasks in the new Inbox widget upsi spoiler . New Widgets With all these changes to widgets they became so powerful that we just had to add some more. Say hello to the new Inbox widget and a special Subtasks widget. The Subtasks widget also lets you complete subtasks directly from your home screen. Missing Lock Screen Widgets If you previously had Lock Screen widgets installed you may have noticed that they have disappeared. Don t worry they are still available and you simply have to re add them once. We had to do this for technical reasons. Thanks for your understanding. We hope you enjoy all these changes and look forward to your feedback. All the best The Structured Team
We are continuing to work hard on a bigger update behind the scenes. This tiny update brings some small fixes and some preparations for the future. Excited for what is coming soon! Leo
We are continuing to work hard on a bigger update behind the scenes. This tiny update brings some small fixes and some preparations for the future. Excited for what is coming soon! Leo

We have been a bit quiet but I can assure you that there is something brewing in the background. Meanwhile we have been squashing a few bugs and improving performance a bit. On top of that this update includes some new app icons you can choose from including some inspired by other indie apps. On Apple Watch we ve added a complication that you can place on the edges of your watch face to quickly see the progress of a task. These complications are only available on watchOS 9 and onwards. Unfortunately we had to remove support for complications in earlier versions. Unfortunately we also had to remove support for undo redo since it was causing more problems than it was solving. But we are planning to bring it back better soon! Leo

We re excited to announce Structured 3.1 which introduces a powerful new feature for our pro users: the Structured Assistant! This experimental feature uses AI to help you plan your day effortlessly using natural language. Structured Assistant The Structured Assistant is designed to make creating tasks even easier and more intuitive. Simply tell the assistant your plan for the day in everyday language and it will use AI to generate a list of tasks for you. No more manual task creation or complex scheduling let the Structured Assistant handle it for you! To give it a try tap the robot icon in the top bar and start speaking or typing your plans. Please note that this feature is currently only available to users subscribed to Structured Pro and can only understand English. We re working on expanding its capabilities and language support in future updates. We hope you find the Structured Assistant helpful in making your daily planning even more efficient. As always we appreciate your feedback and suggestions to help us improve the app further. Thank you for using Structured and have a productive day! Leo and the Structured Team

Today May 18 is Global Accessibility Awareness Day! We want to celebrate this day with some updates to make Structured more accessible and inclusive for everyone. Firstly we improved the support for VoiceOver and VoiceControl making the app easier to use for visually impaired people or those with limited mobility. Moreover we ve also added an alternate font option in the Appearance settings which can help alleviate some symptoms of dyslexia. Choose the font that works best for you and enjoy a more personalized experience. If you have any feedback on how we can make Structured even more accessible for everyone let use know. Leo

Like before Structured 3.0.8 contains many little fixes for issues and resolves one important bigger annoying bug where imported reminder would constantly disappear when opening the app. Thanks to everyone who reported this and helped resolve this issue! Leo
Structured 3.0.7 fixes many little issues and one important bug where restoring the backup would actually remove all tasks sorry about that . Leo
Structured 3.0.6 again only fixes bugs and crashes but something cool is coming soon. Promise! Leo
Structured 3.0.5 fixes a few minor bugs and crashes but nothing big. There is more to come soon! Anyway thanks for using Structured and have a productive day! Leo

Structured 3.0.4 brings you a more seamless and enjoyable experience with a host of bug fixes and performance improvements. Our team has worked tirelessly behind the scenes to eliminate numerous small issues and refine the app s overall functionality. Here s a list of everything we ve fixed or improved for you: Fixed an issue that prevented Apple Watch complications from displaying Resolved an issue that caused Home Screen Widgets to appear empty when tasks overlapped Enhanced calendar integration for better support of recurring events Fixed a problem where widgets would fail to appear on macOS 12 Fixed an issue where the menu bar on macOS would be unresponsive Improved the touchability of certain buttons for ease of use Fixed a problem where tasks would still appear after resetting the app Added a close button to the day picker for added convenience Resolved several crashes for a smoother experience Removed Lunar New Year categories from the icon pickerm while still making the icons available in other categories Improved the overall performance of the app for more efficient use We re confident that these changes will make it easier for you to plan your day and enhance the app s overall quality. If you encounter any issues please don t hesitate to reach out to us. We re continually working on larger updates to further improve the app. Thank you for using Structured and have a productive day! Leo

Our new year s resolution at Structured is to focus on improving the overall quality and performance of the app. We are starting by fixing a long standing and annoying bug where the buttons at the top would sometimes not work. What are your new year s resolutions Which ones did you already abandon Leo

Happy New Year! I hope you had a good start into 2023 and are ready to tackle all your goals. While the new year has already begun for some of us the new lunar year is about to start. To celebrate that we ve added a bunch of new icons like a firework a hong boa and of course icons for all the zodiac signs including a cat for those who celebrate Táº¿t. For all of you who celebrate it I wish you a happy lunar new year and all the best for the year of the rabbit. Leo and the Structured Team

TLDR Look back at what you accomplished in 2022 with the Structured Year In Review starting on Dec 30. Fixed a bug where the app would freeze when selecting a task on macOS. The year is coming to an end and it s time to look back at what happened in 2022. To celebrate your achievements in the past year we ve partnered with the talented Charlotte Vonhof to create some wonderful artworks which show how much you have achieved in 2022. You ll be able to view and share them from the 30th of December in Settings. We can t wait to see yours! At the same time we also want to look forward and are excited about many fantastic things to come in 2023. We can t wait! Meanwhile have some relaxing holidays and a happy new year. Leo

TLDR Drag Drop! Easily move tasks around and rearrange your plan. Timezone Support! Set timezones for tasks to help with travelling and planning meetings. Stunning new app icon! 70 new icons including winter icons and better recommendations. We are super excited to release a big update today! Structured 3.0 will dramatically improve your planning adapt if things don t go as planned and help you when travelling. Drag Drop This has probably been the number one request feature and it is super powerful. You can simply press and hold a task until it pops out of the timeline and then drag it wherever you like. A small preview will show you where the task will be once dropped. But it doesn t stop there. Drag and drop is so deeply integrated into Structured and it works almost everywhere. You can take a task from the inbox and drop it into your day move something to the next day by dropping it on the day at the top and even create a task at a specific time by dragging the Plus button there. On top of all that drag and drop also integrates with the system. You can drag stuff like emails or links into Structured and it will automatically create a task for you. At the same time you can also take a task and drag it out into other apps to create a link to it. There is a lot to explore with drag and drop so go head and move stuff around. Plans sometimes change and that s ok. Timezones People that travel a lot or work with people from other parts of the world know that timezones can sometimes be confusing. If you have a meeting with someone in New York at 1 PM their time when do I need to show up in Berlin it s 7 PM With Structured 3.0 this is now much easier. When creating a task you can assign it a timezone and set the time in that timezone. It will then appear at your local time in your plan so you ll never miss a meeting again. When travelling you can also decide which tasks should stay at a fixed time e.g. a meeting with someone back home or which should adjust to your new location e.g. lunch at 12 . To get the later behavior simply select Floating time zone but don t worry it s also the default one for your tasks. New App Icon As soon as you update you ll probably notice that the app icon on your home screen looks a bit different. Unfortunately we had to adjust the icon since it looked very similar to another company logo but I m happy we had to. The talented Matthew Skills did an outstanding job at designing the new. He even designed a few variations which you can select in the settings and the amazing Donatus Wolf took it upon himself to create one in the style of one sec which you can unlock by enabling the integration. Better Icon Recommendations New Icons There is not only a new app icon but also 70 new icons you can use for your tasks including specific ones for the winter season sorry Southern Hemisphere . This bumps the number of icons to over 600 but luckily the automatic icon selection has also gotten much better so you ll spend less time looking for the right one. Thanks to everyone who requested new icons and make sure to keep them coming if you are missing the perfect icon for your task. Additionally where are also some smaller changes like a more compact visualization of overlapping tasks and bug fixes. Also make sure to check out our blog at structured.app blog http: structured.app blog for a nice video showing the new features! Leo

Do you ever feel like you are semi automatically open Instagram while studying This is actually awful for your focus and will hurt your concentration. Frederik has been tackling this issue with his app one sec which forces you to take a deep breath before opening social media. This trains you to be a lot more intentional about open using them. With Structured 2.6 and one sec 3.2 you can now connect one sec and Structured which will fully block social media apps while you have incomplete tasks in Structured. To enable the integration just go into the in app settings and select one sec . Please note that the integration is only working on iOS iPadOS. This has been a fun project to work on with Frederik who is a fellow indie dev and we are excited to hear what you think! Frederik and Leo

This release will not add anything shiny did you check out the focus timer from last release instead we are doubling down on fixing some bugs that have been bugging pun intended us for a while. The main focus was in and around the calendar and reminder sync which should be a loot better now. Structured is now also ready for macOS 13 Ventura and this update fixes a few bugs related to that. Big shoutout to our QA Engineer Jean Marie who spotted all these bugs and made it super easy to fix them! Give us a shout if you find any other bugs. Leo P.S. You might soon notice that Structured is no longer listed under my name but under unorderly GmbH instead. This is only a legal change to make things safer and more official and does not mean the app has been sold to a big company. It s still me Leo building the app with the help of Kevin social media customer support Jean Marie testing and a few other wonderful people.

Let s focus! Now that s even easier because this update adds a wonderful full screen focus timer. Know exactly how much time you have left on your task. Just select Focus Now on a currently running tasks and you ll be greeted by a huge countdown. I didn t even mention the best thing! If you are running iOS 16.1 you ll even get this beautiful countdown right on your lock screen and for everyone with a fancy new iPhone 14 Pro Max you ll see the remaining time on the dynamic island. That way you ll never lose track of your task no matter what you are doing.

Structured is an indie app. This means that it s built by me Leo and not a big cooperation. There are tons of other great indie apps out there which are just waiting to be used by you! To spread the word about these great apps I ve added a small banner in the settings screen which will show you a different indie app and the developer behind it each week. I don t make any money from this just want to show you some wonderful apps from a few friends. Hope you like it! Leo
Thank you so much for using the app! This version will resolve some minor issues within the app and adds a few small improvements. As always if there are any problems please let me know! Leo

iOS 16 is here and comes with beautiful new lock screens! But what would make those gorgeous lock screens even better Correct your Structured tasks! After you ve updated your device or set up your brand new iPhone you can press and hold your lock screen and add 3 different widget types to it. That way you don t even have to unlock your phone to see what s happing next. Ahh and I ve also fixed a few bugs related to notifications. Sorry about that.

TLDR Over 400 new icons for every task and activity Brand new icon picker with categories search and recently used. Fixed a bug where recurring events were duplicating. Improved translations for Simplified Chines Korean Japanese Thai and Finish. Added a monthly yearly subscription for Structured Pro. If you already have Structured Pro you ll keep lifetime access! One of the key parts of Structured are those small icons you can choose for every task. They make it easy to see what s up at a glance can help categories your task and just add this extra touch. They were inspired by the little stickers you can put into your paper planners but have the added benefit of never running out and Structured 2.3 you ve got a big new pack of those in your mail not literally . 400 New Icons Today s update adds over 400 new icons and updates some existing ones bringing the total to over 550 icons. New icons include a vacuum cleaner or broom for cleaning up a slice of pizza or burger if you get hungry Instagram or Twitter logos if you need to post a picture of your food and a hammock if you need to relax after eating it. But all these icons also want to get found and scrolling through 550 might be relaxing but will probably not get you closer to your goals. That s why I ve added tons of new features to the brand new icons view. All New Icons Picker First and foremost all the icons are grouped into 17 different Categories and you can quickly jump to the correct one using the Categories Bar at the bottom. Alternatively you can also use the Search Bar at the top to find a fitting icon or pick one of the suggested ones I m working on improving the suggestions soon . If you have a few favorite icons you use over and over again may I suggest the candy icon they will pop up in the Recently used section where you can quickly access them. Premium Icons Some new icons are now part of Structured Pro and require you to upgrade to use them. If you ve upgrade to Structured Pro in the past you ll already have access to all premium and free icons. All old and some new icons 250 in total can be used by all Structured users for free. These include icons for cycling knitting and importantly all school related icons. Still missing icons 550 icons cover plenty of different activities as everyone s life is different I m sure there are still some missing. If you can t find the perfect icon for your hobby or pet simply use the Request Icon form at the bottom and I ll do my best to add more icons in future updates. What else changed Besides adding 400 icons and improving the icon pickers I ve also reworked the inner workings of recurring tasks. This does not bring any new features but should fix a bug where they kept duplicating and improve their performance. The translation for Simplified Chines Korean Japanese Thai and Finish should now also be more consistent. Other than that Structured is now offering a yearly and monthly plan in addition to the existing lifetime plan. Everyone who has bough Structured Pro in the past will keep their lifetime plan for life the life of the app not your life . The new lifetime plan will be more expensive but it remains at the current price for a limited time.

Thank you so much for using the app! This version will resolve some minor issues within the app and adds a few small improvements. Fixed improved in this version: Subtasks on recurring tasks should no longer be checked off for future days Undo Redo: You can now undo a recent change by pressing CMD Z or holding with 3 fingers and then using the action bar at the top. Some performance improvements which should also reduce the energy consumption of the app. As always if there are any problems please let me know! Leo

Apple Watch Complications are here!!! With the addition of the Apple Watch app you no longer had to use your iPhone to see the next task. Now you don t even have to open the Apple Watch app... There are a couple of different complications to choose from. From a small symbol of the next task in the corner to a relatively big display of the current and next task. Other than that I ve fixed a couple of smaller bugs let me know if you find more! Leo

Do you speak French Portuguese Italian Spanish or Dutch If so you are in luck. Because thanks to the help from the people of Wordcrafts those languages should be more consistent and more natural. In addition to that I ve fixed a couple of bugs in the app and added a link to the Structured Blog blog.structured.app . Make sure to check out the post about other great indie apps! Leo

TLDR Structured turns 2. Yay! Structured for Apple Watch! Custom Alerts Notification Sounds More App Icons including drafts from over 2 years ago Put on the party hats and turn up the music. Structured is turning TWO! Only two years ago I released a little day planner I created in my free time without any expectations and two years later over 1.7 Million people have downloaded it. What better way to celebrate then with a big fat update version 2.2 so many 2 s . Last version I released Structured on Mac and today we are taking over the next device a much smaller one admittedly : Apple Watch! If you own an Apple Watch you ll now be able to see your schedule complete tasks or reschedule them right on your wrist. Now you can put your distracting phone away and just focus on getting sh t done. Your tasks will automatically sync via iCloud so make sure that is enabled. But we ve got more even if you don t own an Apple Watch : Custom Alerts Notification Sounds. You can now set up alerts to remind you about tasks before they start and can adjust those alerts for each task separately. On top of all that you can also choose out of more than 20 notification sounds including some animal sounds . Customizing alerts requires Structured Pro but now for the first time you can get notifications at the beginning of the task for free. Additionally you ll find two new and old app icons in the Appearance section of the Settings. This includes some of the first drafts for Structured icons spoiler: there is a reason they stayed drafts . Furthermore if you d like to learn more about Structured s history have a look at the article at blog.structured.app. That s it. So take a piece of cake and enjoy the party. Leo

StandWithUkraine Millions of people are suffering from Putin s invasion of Ukraine. To help I ll be donating all proceeds from this week to charities helping Ukraine. Visit https: help.structured.app stand with ukraine to learn more. I ve also replaced the app s startup screen as a sign of solidarity with the people of Ukraine. Glory to Ukraine!
Hey there After the big release of Structured for Mac last week make sure to download it in the Mac App Store! this update will only fix a few bugs and crashes. Cheers Leo

Hey there It s finally time to bring Structured to the big screen. The Mac not the cinema yet... ! Starting today you ll be able to download Structured from the Mac App Store requires macOS 12 and can start planning your day using a mouse and keyboard. All your tasks will sync automatically over iCloud and you ll have access to all pro features if you ve already upgraded on iOS. Let me know how it goes! If you don t use macOS don t worry there are also a couple of nice improvements in the iOS version! Reorder Subtasks: You can now drag and drop subtasks to reorder them when editing a task. Full Reminder Sync: You can now choose to also sync the time and day back to the Reminders app if you changed it in Structured. Week Start: You can now change the first day of the week in settings. Backups: Structured will now create backups of your tasks and store them in iCloud Drive. This is an experimental feature but might save you in the future... New Languages: You can now plan your day in Afrikaans or Persian! Thanks to all the translators! As always thanks to everyone who has helped test this update and the Mac version! Cheers Leo

Happy New Year! I hope you were able to get some rest and are recharged to start strong into the new year. There are tons of exciting things ahead for Structured for 2022 and I can t wait to get started. The first big one is a Mac app to help you plan your day on the big screen and during work. You can already try it by following the guide in the settings. As it s currently in beta you might still encounter some small issues so be careful. Other than that this update contains some small improvements to help you in the new year: Faster widgets: I ve made some small tweaks and accelerated the updates of the widgets by 40 Keyboard shortcuts: If you use an iPad with a keyboard you ll now be able to press CMD N to create a new task or CMD to go to the next day. Just hold down CMD to see all shortcuts. Some smaller bug fixes and improvements As always let me know if you find any issues! Have a great day Leo

Structured 2.0 was released a few weeks ago and I ve already gotten tons of feedback! This small update just fixes a couple of crashes and issues that came up during the last weeks. Let me know if you encounter anything else... What s New in Structured 2.0 Inbox: A place to keep all your tasks which do not yet have a time and day. Reminders Import: Apple Reminders can now be automatically imported into the new Inbox Pro Feature . Better widgets: The widgets should now work better and show more tasks. Notes and Subtasks: The redesigned task editor now gives you the option to add notes and subtasks to your tasks. More recurring options: You can now set an end to your repeating events and choose to only repeat them every X days weeks or months Pro Feature . More timing options: Tasks can now be all day and also start before midnight or last until after midnight. Better task suggestions: When creating a task the suggestion will now be better and update live while you are typing. iPad Support: Structured as always worked on the iPad but now it works even better. You can have a sidebar with your inbox and still see your plan while creating tasks. Global color theme: Finally you can choose your favorite color throughout the app! New App icons: There is a new app icon but you can also choose from different color or revert back to the old one. Task detail view: The new compact view for each task displays the notes and subtasks. There you ll also find some quick actions like Copy or Delete. Improved day plan: The day plan now includes more details for each task like how many subtasks are completed or if there is a Zoom link attached. At the top you ll also find a special place for all your all day tasks and a better visualization when tasks are overlapping. Plus you can now swipe left and right to change the day and the Add button is easier to reach! Reset app: If you d like to start with a clean slate you can now reset the whole app. Accessibility: VoiceOver should now work better and larger text sizes should look better. Under the hood improvements: There are also a lot of small performance improvements and lots of fixes with calendar imports. Even more languages: Structured now supports almost 30 languages also some right to left ones! Thanks again to all the users who help translate the app!!! That should be everything! I hope you like it let me know what you think! If you have any problems please just reach out! I m always happy to help! A big thanks also to everyone who helped test this version and found all the bugs before the big release!!! Leo

Structured 2.0 was released a few weeks ago and I ve already gotten tons of feedback! This small update just fixes a couple of crashes and issues that came up during the last weeks. Let me know if you encounter anything else... New in this version I ve reworked the advanced time and duration controls that come up when tapping the wheel or the More button next to the duration. This now allows quicker time entry and allows you to pick times after midnight. The new advanced duration picker allows much quicker duration entry and you can now also change the presets in the duration slider! In settings you can now find the new Help Center . There frequent questions are answered and some functionallity is explained in more detail. Fixed in this version Fixed an issue where part of the timeline was cut off. Fixed an issue when resetting the app. Fixed an issue with the emoji keyboard. Added more haptic feedback. I ve also heard from a couple of users that the app freezes when using a trackpad or mouse on the iPad. This issue should be fixed in iOS 15.1. If you experience such an issue please update your device. What s New in Structured 2.0 Inbox: A place to keep all your tasks which do not yet have a time and day. Reminders Import: Apple Reminders can now be automatically imported into the new Inbox Pro Feature . Better widgets: The widgets should now work better and show more tasks. Notes and Subtasks: The redesigned task editor now gives you the option to add notes and subtasks to your tasks. More recurring options: You can now set an end to your repeating events and choose to only repeat them every X days weeks or months Pro Feature . More timing options: Tasks can now be all day and also start before midnight or last until after midnight. Better task suggestions: When creating a task the suggestion will now be better and update live while you are typing. iPad Support: Structured as always worked on the iPad but now it works even better. You can have a sidebar with your inbox and still see your plan while creating tasks. Global color theme: Finally you can choose your favorite color throughout the app! New App icons: There is a new app icon but you can also choose from different color or revert back to the old one. Task detail view: The new compact view for each task displays the notes and subtasks. There you ll also find some quick actions like Copy or Delete. Improved day plan: The day plan now includes more details for each task like how many subtasks are completed or if there is a Zoom link attached. At the top you ll also find a special place for all your all day tasks and a better visualization when tasks are overlapping. Plus you can now swipe left and right to change the day and the Add button is easier to reach! Reset app: If you d like to start with a clean slate you can now reset the whole app. Accessibility: VoiceOver should now work better and larger text sizes should look better. Under the hood improvements: There are also a lot of small performance improvements and lots of fixes with calendar imports. Even more languages: Structured now supports almost 30 languages also some right to left ones! Thanks again to all the users who help translate the app!!! That should be everything! I hope you like it let me know what you think! If you have any problems please just reach out! I m always happy to help! A big thanks also to everyone who helped test this version and found all the bugs before the big release!!! Leo

Structured 2.0 was released a few weeks ago and I ve already gotten tons of feedback! This small update just fixes a couple of crashes and issues that came up during the last weeks. Let me know if you encounter anything else... Fixed in this version Fixes some text for accessibility users Fixes a problem where notifications for deleted recurring tasks would still appear Fixes a problem where autocomplete didn t work for certain keyboards languages. Adds haptic feedback for some elements on supported devices. Fixes an issue where monthly recurring tasks would always appear on the last day of the month. I ve also heard from a couple of users that the app freezes when using a trackpad or mouse on the iPad. This issue should be fixed in iOS 15.1. If you experience such an issue please update your device. What s New in Structured 2.0 Inbox: A place to keep all your tasks which do not yet have a time and day. Reminders Import: Apple Reminders can now be automatically imported into the new Inbox Pro Feature . Better widgets: The widgets should now work better and show more tasks. Notes and Subtasks: The redesigned task editor now gives you the option to add notes and subtasks to your tasks. More recurring options: You can now set an end to your repeating events and choose to only repeat them every X days weeks or months Pro Feature . More timing options: Tasks can now be all day and also start before midnight or last until after midnight. Better task suggestions: When creating a task the suggestion will now be better and update live while you are typing. iPad Support: Structured as always worked on the iPad but now it works even better. You can have a sidebar with your inbox and still see your plan while creating tasks. Global color theme: Finally you can choose your favorite color throughout the app! New App icons: There is a new app icon but you can also choose from different color or revert back to the old one. Task detail view: The new compact view for each task displays the notes and subtasks. There you ll also find some quick actions like Copy or Delete. Improved day plan: The day plan now includes more details for each task like how many subtasks are completed or if there is a Zoom link attached. At the top you ll also find a special place for all your all day tasks and a better visualization when tasks are overlapping. Plus you can now swipe left and right to change the day and the Add button is easier to reach! Reset app: If you d like to start with a clean slate you can now reset the whole app. Accessibility: VoiceOver should now work better and larger text sizes should look better. Under the hood improvements: There are also a lot of small performance improvements and lots of fixes with calendar imports. Even more languages: Structured now supports almost 30 languages also some right to left ones! Thanks again to all the users who help translate the app!!! That should be everything! I hope you like it let me know what you think! If you have any problems please just reach out! I m always happy to help! A big thanks also to everyone who helped test this version and found all the bugs before the big release!!! Leo

Thanks for using Structured! This update brings some nice additions and a lot of minor improvements and fixes: New Task Icons I ve added a lot of new icons to better plan your morning routine or school courses. The app now also learns what icons you pick and automatically chooses the best one. Let me know if what other icons you need to describe your tasks. Lots of New Languages Structured your day in different languages! You can now also plan your day in French Catalan Norwegian and Danish. Big thanks to everyone who helped translate. Check out the Credits page in the settings. If you d like to help translate Structured into your language let me know at structured leomehlig.com. Other improvements I ve also fixed a lot of bugs with notifications and improved the widget. Thanks again for using Structured and I d be happy about a small tip in settings. Let me know if there are any problems or you have any other suggestions! Leo

This version fixes a crash on older iOS version. Thanks again for using Structured and I d be happy about a small tip in settings. Let me know if there are any problems you have any other suggestions or want to help translate Structured into your language! Leo

This version fixes a couple of small issues Notification are now more reliable. You can also now get notifications about calendar events!!! Fixed a few issues with iCloud Sync. Should now be better and faster! You can now help improve the Smart Icons by sharing your selected icons. Optional of course! Thanks again for using Structured and I d be happy about a small tip in settings. Let me know if there are any problems you have any other suggestions or want to help translate Structured into your language! Leo

New in version 1.5: Weekly Overview The top bar now displays the whole week. This makes switching between days a lot quicker and the small icons give you a feeling of what s happening on each day. You can also swipe to see what s up next week or to revisit the past. If you prefer living in the day you can collapse the bar by tapping the and focus on today. Performance Boost I ve reworked some of the internals of the day plan and was able to significantly speed up the list. It should now be a lot quicker to scroll around your plan and switch between days. Better Notifications Structured can now also remind you to tick off a task after it finished and you won t even have to open the app to do it. Just tap and hold the notification and you will get an option to mark the task as complete. Of course you can also fine tune your notifications in settings. German Localisation Strukturiere deinen Tag! You can now plan your day in German. If you d like to help translate Structured into your language let me know at structured leomehlig.com. Other improvements I ve also fixed a lot of bugs and improved the iCloud sync. If you continue to have problems syncing across devices visits the iCloud Sync page in the settings for more information and help. Thanks again for using Structured and I d be happy about a small tip in settings. Let me know if there are any problems or you have any other suggestions! Leo

Thanks everyone for using Structured! This version adds a much request feature for all power users! You can now set a task to repeat on a set of weekdays. You can also copy tasks from a previous day when starting to plan a new day. This will give you a nice headstart! I also fixed a bug and you can now again choose any duration you want for your task. Thanks to everyone who reported that problem. As always please let me know if there are any problems. You can contact me at structured leomehlig.com! Have a great day! Leo

Thanks everyone for using Structured! This version adds support for the new Home Screen Widgets and gives you the ability to choose a color for your task! This update also changes a lot under the hood so let me know if there are any hiccups. You can also contact me at structured leomehlig.com! There is a lot planned for the next release so stay tuned! Have a great day! Leo
This version fixes a crash that affected a few users. I m sorry. If you stumble upon any other problems please let me know at structured leomehlig.com!

This version of Structured adds the ability to sync your tasks across different iOS devices using iCloud. The sync happens automatically and you don t have to do anything but may result in some duplicate tasks initially. If anything unexpected happens please let me know at structured leomehlig.com! Thanks for using the app and for all the tips!

This version of Structured fixes crashes some of you experienced! If anything does not work as expected or the app crashes please always let me know. You can reach me at structured leomehlig.com. Thanks for using the app and for all the tips! Stay Structured!

Thanks for using Structured! This update adds the ability to plan regular tasks like brushing your teeth. You can now set a task to only occur once or repeat it daily weekly or monthly. To do this tap once underneath the time picker. For everyone who does not want to plan ahead that much Structured now recommends tasks you do often again. Hopefully this will speed up your planning! Thanks to everyone who used the tip jar in the settings. This motivates me a lot to continue improving the app!!!

Thanks for using Structured! This update adds the ability to import your calendar events into your day plan. This way you can plan your perfect day while keeping up with all the meetings. I ve also added a Tip Jar to the settings if you want to support the development with a few bucks. Stay Structured!
You don t like pink You can now switch to a classy monochrome look in settings.
